official_title: A bill to amend title 9 of the United States Code to improve the appellate process in the Federal courts of appeals with respect to arbitration.
short_title: Courts of Appeals Arbitration Improvement Act of 1987

summary.text: Courts of Appeals Arbitration Improvement Act of 1987 - Specifies when appeals from an arbitration decision may and may not be made.

titles.title: Courts of Appeals Arbitration Improvement Act of 1987
A bill to amend title 9 of the United States Code to improve the appellate process in the Federal courts of appeals with respect to arbitration.
